Package discmania.ui

Class Summary
BaseServlet A base class that all the other servlets extend.
BrowseDiscsServlet For browsing and searching the discs.
CheckoutServlet Checkout servlet.
DiscManagementServlet Manages the disk catalogue at the store.
InitServlet Initializes database access and the Velocity system.
LoginServlet Logs Users in and out of the system.
RegisterServlet Registers new users.
ResultPage A simple java bean representing a result page in a disc listing.
ShoppingCartServlet Maintains the shopping cart.
UserManagementServlet For managing users.
WarehouseServlet Used by the employees at warehouse to control the disc balances etc.
ViewDiscServlet Views information of a single disc.
ViewOrdersServlet Allows customers to view the orders they've made.
